tag_list: student, technology, kettering-university, job, mechanical-engineer, norwalk
overview:
Mark is currently a senior at Kettering University in Flint, Michigan and is working on his Bachelors of Science in Mechanical Engineering with a Management Minor and looking for a job.

Mark is on schedule to graduate in June of this year. Mark is currently engaged to the most beautiful and smartest women in the world. Mark is originally from Norwalk, Ohio which is just south of Cedar Point. Mark has three brothers, all of which are older then him. Mark is constantly interested in new and upcoming technologies. Mark likes to have the newest gagdets and love playing with new gadgets. Mark got a BlackBerry several months ago and he loves learning new things about it and getting the latest applications. Mark is eager to learn and explore the world of technology.
